abstract: Protesters involved in the Occupy Wall Street movement use Facebook, Twitter and other social media tools to deliver photos and videos from dozen of demonstrations in real time.
snippet: Protesters involved in the Occupy Wall Street movement use Facebook, Twitter and other social media tools to deliver photos and videos from dozen of demonstrations in real time.
lead_paragraph: The online conversation about the Occupy Wall Street movement turned global over the weekend as protesters provided live Twitter updates, photos and videos from the dozens of demonstrations around the world.

headline.main: Social Media Gives Wall Street Protests a Global Reach
